item.title: Notes on "Retrieval Augmented Reinforcement Learning"
item.description: Notes on "Retrieval Augmented Reinforcement Learning", which describes how agents can learn to retrieve relevant past trajectories to improve agent performance.

item.title: How Baleen Works
item.description: A walkthough of Baleen, a late interaction-based multi-hop question answering system.

item.description: Automating the fun part of video games.
